status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a9rde","text":"Fresh tissue should be processed on the same day if possible, but can be stored at 4°C for a maximum of overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fm844","text":"To reduce pathogens, the tissue should be incubated for   at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9i4kf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"814jt","text":"The tissue is divided in the lab into pieces with an edge length of 1-2 mm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dq2pi","text":"Mix the fragments of a tumor piece so that each aliquot is as representative as possible of the tumor area.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9o160","text":"16 (decision from June 29, 2023; previously: 8) fragments are stored in 1 ml of freezing medium in a cryotube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56ncc","text":"If there are enough fragments for more than 4 cryotubes, more fragments can be combined in one tube. A maximum of 5 cryotubes of each entity are frozen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ils7","text":"Please add pictures of:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7la09","text":"the orgin of the sample in the organ (if avaible)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":49}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66iko","text":"each tissue piece that has been taken before cutting the fragments. The picture should include the tissue ID (in the picture)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":125}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9j4lp","text":"the documentation sheet","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"92d4o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hs30","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffave","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6r3eb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6oluv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0j00","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5c20g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfc8s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":null,"entityMap":null,"guid":"82AF4C13C266475E9444BD35B819862B"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cm0k3","text":"On the next day transfer the tubes to N2 in the right order and document the location in the N2 binder and the list mentioned in Step 9","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1u3i4","text":"New procedure for storage and dokumentation started in May 2024 (change of storage tubes to LVL-Tubes with Barcode)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7raru","text":"scan tube numbers and fill in the list mentioned in Step 9","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fiadj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e8ujc","text":"Cryo tubes should be additionally labelled as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1dev5","text":"Patient ID, Organ, T1/T2 resp. N1/N2...","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":39}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fugi8","text":"No. of Pieces","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1aord","text":"Date","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
